title: Towie’s Olivia Attwood appears to leave new engagement ring at home
text:
Olivia Attwood is back at work (Picture: Rex/Instagram)

Olivia Attwood was back filming The Only Way Is Essex on Tuesday, two days after confirming her happy engagement news.

But the reality star seemed to have left her engagement ring at home, as she was pictured wearing a square diamond ring, rather than the stunning oval-shaped sparkler Bradley Dack used to propose.

Or maybe the lucky devil has two engagement rings!?

Filming in London with Chloe Sims, the Love Island star wore jeggings and a tee and covered up with a red fur jacket, chunky ankle boots and an oversized scarf.

Although she was quick to flash her ring finger, it appeared that the jewellery Bradley had chosen to pop the questions had been switched out for a different piece.

The reality star seemed to have switched her engagement ring (Picture: Rex)

The 28-year-old now stars in Towie (Picture: Rex)

The 28-year-old, who now stars in Towie, shared the happy news with her Instagram followers on Sunday evening with Bradley proposing on their romantic getaway to Dubai.

In sweet photos shared on her page, Olivia and Bradley are seen kissing and smiling for the camera in front of the Burj Al Arab, while showing off the large diamond ring on her left hand.

‘He must be crazy… Here’s to forever. I love you BD.’ (Picture:Instagram)

Olivia cheekily captioned the announcement: ‘He must be crazy… Here’s to forever. I love you BD.’

The couple were flooded with congratulatory messages from their celebrity pals, including Olivia’s Love Island co-star Gabby Allen, who wrote: ‘OH MY GOD!!! Congratulations you two. Wowwwwww.’

The couple were flooded with congratulatory messages from their celebrity pals (Picture: Rex)

Olivia’s Love Island bestie Amber Davies was clearly a little overwhelmed with her friend’s happy news and simply wrote: ‘I JUST CAN’T COPE.’

Other stars to congratulate the newly-engaged couple include Gemma Collins, Bobby Norris, Olivia Buckland, Sam Faiers and Nicola McClean.

It’s been a fairly rocky road for Olivia and Bradley, who dated before she found fame on ITV’s Love Island in 2017.

They’ve since broken up several times, most recently in April when Olivia confirmed their split on her Instagram Stories, only to reconcile with the footballer two days later.

Olivia has certainly caused a stir since joining Towie, and her feud with Courtney Green shows no signs of abating as it was reported she has been approached by clothing companies to bring out a line called Trashy, after she was labelled ‘trashy and unclassy’ by fellow cast member Courtney during an on-screen argument last month.
